content.p: Here at the University of Nottingham, we don't settle for ordinary. Our courses develop your skills and knowledge to help you become unstoppable in your career. That's why we are among the top five UK universities most targeted by graduate employers. Join a community of 47,000 students from over 150 countries who are already beginning to make a difference locally, nationally, and globally. Whoever you are, whatever you're into, find your people here at UoN. Tailor your own campus experience and be you. Whatever support or guidance you need, we are here to help. Sports University of the Year (The Times and The Sunday Times Good University Guide 2024) in the UK for top employers (High Fliers Graduate Report 2024) in the UK for research power (Research Excellence Framework 2021) Teaching at the University of Nottingham isn't like any you'll find elsewhere. Our tutors put your student experience first - learning, listening and acting on regular feedback to deliver first-class teaching that's relevant to you and your journey. Weâ€™re consistently ranked in the top UK universities for employability, with more than 4 out of every 5 students going on to land highly skilled jobs or into further study within 15 months of graduating.
